headline: Piper Sandler Reiterates Its ‘Overweight’ Rating on AbbVie Inc. (ABBV) with a $231 PT
summary: AbbVie Inc. (NYSE:ABBV) is one of the 15 Best Stocks to Invest in for Financial Stability. On September 12, 2025, Piper Sandler reiterated its ‘Overweight’ rating on AbbVie Inc. (NYSE:ABBV) with a $231 price target. This comes after the company settled with abbreviated New Drug Application (ANDA) filers over Rinvoq. The agreement delays generic entry […]
